name: FLIGHT TRAINING ADELAIDE PTY LTD
about: Flight Training Adelaide (FTA) is a world-class aviation training provider, founded in 1982 and based at Parafield Airport, South Australia. FTA specializes in customized aviation training solutions for the fixed wing and rotary wing sectors, focusing on producing future airline and helicopter captains. The school offers a range of services including commercial pilot license training, airline cadet programs, ab initio, and advanced training courses. With a strong commitment to integrated learning, FTA develops both theoretical knowledge and practical flying skills concurrently. FTA caters to both domestic and international students and is recognized internationally for its high-quality training, utilizing modern aircraft and simulators. FTA's highly trained staff ensures a training environment that exceeds student expectations, preparing them for successful careers in the aviation industry.
services:
